title: Chest Gifting
body: The thing says I get a chest if I score an s- or higher in a game by myself or with someone else to get a chest. Well I have 4 available and I just got an s on the match I just played and didn't receive a chest. please help :) ty

replies.body: alright I didn't know it was once per season

Have you already earned a chest on this champion this season? You're only able to earn a hextech chest while playing a champ **once per season**. 

If you're sure that you should have received one for this match, please link me or [**take a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) of the match history entry for this.
Are you sure you met all the Hextech chest [requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)?  Also did you try relogging back into the client?
